column1: Inventory Management - Kampstore Sales (1).csv column definitions:

column2: Definition
Unique ID assigned by script importing the data from our POS.
Property where the transaction took place.
Date the transaction occurred
Store Department for reporting purposes
Item name as it is in our POS
Item type imported from our POS, this is irrelevant for our purposes
The item SKU
How the sale was made. I'm not really interested in this right now, the information may prove useful later.
Quantity of that item sold during that transaction.
Total price, before discounts, of the item(s) sold.
Amount discounted off of the Gross Sales
Gross Sales Minus Discounts
What price the item was sold for at the time of the transaction.
What it cost to purchase the item for inventory at the time of the transaction.
Caclulated profit margin.
POS calculated value, ignore.
Should match the sales date, ignore.
Extracted from the original title as a way to group items together for reporting purposes.
Extracted from the original title as a way to group items together for reporting purposes.
Extracted from the original title as a way to group items together for reporting purposes.

column1: Inventory Management - Inventory Count Log (1).csv column definitions:

column2: Definition
Unique ID assigned to that inventory count log
Timestamp for when the item was counted
Property where the item was counted, Should match "Property"  in Inventory Management - Kampstore Sales (1).csv
The item SKU, should match "SKU"  in Inventory Management - Kampstore Sales (1).csv
Item Name, should match "Original Title" in Inventory Management - Kampstore Sales (1).csv
Store Department for reporting purposes, should match "Department" in Inventory Management - Kampstore Sales (1).csv

Quantity of item in inventory at time of log. For each SKU at at each Property, only the most recent value matters for current status, all other values can be ignored unless reporting early dates or historical trends.
ID of employee that counted the inventory for that log.
Notes, if any, provided by the employee that entered the log.
